meanings.definition: relating to, done, or used in the open air
meanings.sent1: I love the fresh air and sunshine in the outdoor park.
meanings.sent2: We enjoy having picnics in the outdoor setting.
meanings.sent3: The outdoor party was a hit with everyone dancing under the stars.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the outdoor space like music.
meanings.sent5: The outdoor adventure left us with unforgettable memories.

meanings.definition: an outdoor space or area, especially a garden or patio
meanings.sent1: The outdoor of the house is perfect for family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: She loves to relax in the outdoor with a book in hand.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the outdoor seem to have their own little community.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the outdoor bloomed beautifully, adding color to the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The outdoor is a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life.
